steps: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water according to package instructions until al dente.
While the spaghetti is cooking, heat a pan over medium heat and add the pancetta.
Fry the pancetta until crispy, then add minced garlic and cook for another minute.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
Once the spaghetti is cooked, reserve 1 cup of pasta water and drain the rest.
Add the hot spaghetti to the pancetta pan and mix well.
Remove the pan from heat and quickly add egg mixture, stirring continuously to create a creamy sauce. If needed, add reserved pasta water to reach desired consistency.
Serve immediately, garnished with additional Parmesan cheese and black pepper.
